articles.description: As we approach April, buzz about the upcoming  NFL  draft is beginning to reach a fever pitch.      Before we can get there, however, there's still plenty of action to come down the pike this offseason, and not all of it will be free agency-related...
articles.content:
Gail Burton/Associated Press
The NFL quarterback carousel keeps turnin' this offseason, and it doesn't seem like it's ready to stop just yet. 
Jaguars quarterback Gardner Minshew II is another sign… [+1125 chars]
